ideas.title: Add loading/error/empty states to SettingsTouringSection
ideas.description: Component has isLoading and isError flags from useQuery but never renders skeleton, error UI, or empty state. Form shows blank when disconnected.
ideas.rationale: Users see a blank form with no feedback when data is loading or fails — confusing UX that suggests the feature is broken.
ideas.current_state: isLoading/isError flags exist but are unused. No skeleton, error banner, or empty state.
ideas.proposed_change: Add loading skeleton (reuse SettingsFormSkeleton pattern), check isError to show error banner with retry, and show 'Connect Bandsintown first' empty state when disconnected.
ideas.user_benefit: Clear feedback during loading, actionable error messages, and guidance when feature isn't configured.

ideas.title: Add loading/error states to SettingsAdPixelsSection
ideas.description: Uses useQuery to fetch pixel settings without loading skeleton or error handling. Query failure silently fails to populate form.
ideas.rationale: Silent failure leaves users staring at empty form fields with no indication something went wrong.
ideas.current_state: No loading skeleton, no error UI, no empty state for unconfigured pixels.
ideas.proposed_change: Add skeleton while loading, error banner on failure, and 'Add your first tracking pixel' empty state with setup guidance.
ideas.user_benefit: Users understand when data is loading vs. when nothing is configured, and get help recovering from errors.

ideas.title: Surface mutation errors to users in settings sections
ideas.description: SettingsAnalyticsSection and SettingsBrandingSection catch mutation errors silently — optimistic rollback happens but user sees no feedback.
ideas.rationale: Users toggle a setting, see it flip back with no explanation — feels like a bug rather than a network error.
ideas.current_state: try/catch rolls back optimistic update silently. No toast or error message.
ideas.proposed_change: Add toast.error() in catch block: 'Failed to update setting. Please try again.' Uses existing Sonner toast infrastructure.
ideas.user_benefit: Users understand why their change didn't stick and know to retry.

ideas.title: Add skip navigation link to main layout
ideas.description: No skip link found in any layout file. Keyboard/screen reader users must tab through entire nav to reach content.
ideas.rationale: WCAG 2.4.1 requires a mechanism to bypass repeated navigation blocks. This is a basic a11y requirement.
ideas.current_state: No skip links in any layout.
ideas.proposed_change: Add Skip to content at top of layouts + id='main-content' on main content area.
ideas.user_benefit: Keyboard and screen reader users can bypass navigation with a single keystroke.

ideas.title: Replace hardcoded hex/RGB colors in home demo components
ideas.description: 20+ instances of hardcoded colors (#22c55e, #f59e0b, rgb(52,211,153), etc.) in demo and marketing components instead of design tokens.
ideas.rationale: Hardcoded colors break theme consistency and won't adapt to theme changes or high-contrast mode.
ideas.current_state: Hardcoded hex (#22c55e), RGB (rgb(52,211,153)), and RGBA values inline.
ideas.proposed_change: Replace with Tailwind token classes (text-success, bg-warning, text-primary-token) or CSS variables where dynamic values needed.
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent theming, proper high-contrast mode support, easier maintenance.

ideas.title: Add Suspense boundaries to dashboard and settings pages
ideas.description: Main dashboard, chat, and settings pages use force-dynamic but lack Suspense streaming. Users see blank page until all data resolves.
ideas.rationale: Progressive rendering via Suspense lets users see the page shell immediately while data streams in.
ideas.current_state: force-dynamic with no Suspense. Only admin and insights pages have Suspense boundaries (~20% coverage).
ideas.proposed_change: Wrap data-dependent sections in <Suspense fallback={<DashboardOverviewSkeleton />}>. Existing skeleton components can serve as fallbacks.
ideas.user_benefit: Dashboard shell renders instantly; data sections stream in progressively.

ideas.title: Add explicit dimensions to home page Next.js Image components
ideas.description: Several home page Image components lack width/height, risking Cumulative Layout Shift during SSR hydration.
ideas.rationale: Images without declared dimensions cause layout shifts — Google Core Web Vitals penalty.
ideas.current_state: Next.js Image tags without width/height or fill prop with sized container.
ideas.proposed_change: Add explicit width and height props to each Image, or use fill prop with a sized parent container.
ideas.user_benefit: Zero layout shift during image load — smoother experience and better Core Web Vitals.

ideas.title: Standardize button heights across app
ideas.description: Inconsistent button heights: h-8, h-9, h-10, h-11, h-14, h-[54px], h-[52px]. ClaimHandleForm uses h-[54px]! with !important.
ideas.rationale: Inconsistent sizing makes the app feel unpolished and breaks visual rhythm.
ideas.current_state: 6+ different button heights, some with !important overrides.
ideas.proposed_change: Standardize to design system sizes: sm=28px, default=32px, lg=40px, xl=44px. Remove !important overrides.
ideas.user_benefit: Visually consistent interface that feels polished and intentional.

ideas.title: Add tactile button press feedback
ideas.description: Buttons only have color hover effects. No scale/press feedback on click.
ideas.rationale: Subtle press feedback makes buttons feel responsive — standard in modern UIs like Linear.
ideas.current_state: Hover: color change. Active: no visual feedback.
ideas.proposed_change: Add active:scale-[0.98] transition-transform to button base styles in CVA definition.
ideas.user_benefit: Buttons feel tactile and responsive — clearer confirmation that click registered.

ideas.title: Standardize transition duration tokens
ideas.description: Mix of duration-200, duration-500, and design token durations (duration-normal=160ms).
ideas.rationale: Inconsistent timing makes animations feel disjointed.
ideas.current_state: Mix of arbitrary Tailwind durations and token values.
ideas.proposed_change: Replace arbitrary durations with design tokens: duration-fast (100ms), duration-normal (160ms), duration-slow (250ms).
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent, cohesive motion language across the entire app.

ideas.title: Add SettingsTouringSection button pending states
ideas.description: isSaving and isDisconnecting flags exist but aren't reflected in button UI.
ideas.rationale: Without visual pending state, users may click repeatedly causing duplicate requests.
ideas.current_state: isSaving/isDisconnecting flags exist but buttons don't show loading or disabled state.
ideas.proposed_change: Add loading={isSaving} to save button and loading={isDisconnecting} to disconnect button.
ideas.user_benefit: Clear feedback that action is in progress; prevents double-clicks.

ideas.title: Add min-height reserves on dynamic content containers
ideas.description: Several containers grow dynamically when content loads, causing layout jank.
ideas.rationale: Content appearing and shifting layout below is jarring.
ideas.current_state: No min-height on containers. Content grows from 0 height.
ideas.proposed_change: Add min-h-[expected] to search result containers, form step wrappers, and chat message skeleton containers.
ideas.user_benefit: Smoother content loading without layout jank.

ideas.title: Standardize focus ring patterns
ideas.description: Mix of focus-visible:ring-2, focus-ring, and focus-ring-themed across components.
ideas.rationale: Inconsistent focus indicators confuse keyboard users.
ideas.proposed_change: Standardize on focus-ring-themed pattern across all interactive elements.
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent, predictable focus indicators for keyboard navigation.
